name: Nature`s Secrets Papaya Face Wash
description: It’s an All in One! Get the all natural goodness of real Papaya extract that's rich in vitamins and scientifically proven anti-oxidants for soft, radiant skin. Papaya extract is known to help reduce freckles and dark spots. Skin friendly at pH 5.5 -6.0 and 100% soap free. Achieve a natural softness. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
